document_data.mainbody: '''''Dungeon'' issue 54''' was released in July/August of 1995. It contained the following articles related to the [[Forgotten Realms]]:

Index.Characters (in order of appearance:
* [[Milon]] - human commoner, counselor of Velen
* [[Ostro Redsea]] - pirate (deceased)
* [[Tobal]] - human commoner, counselor of Velen
* [[Strabon]] - [[Red Wizards of Thay|Red Wizard of Thay]] (deceased)
* [[Federigo]] - outlaw (deceased)
* [[Malev]] - Nalfeshnee
* [[Huggre]] - Rutterkin
* [[Simutan]] - Bar-lgura

:;Settlements: [[Velen]]
:;Wilderness: [[Forest of Tethir]]

:[[Asavir Channel]] • [[Chult]] • [[Port Castigliar]] • [[Waterdeep]]
